TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CacheEntryUpdateCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The information about the entry that is about to be removed from the cache.
Docs.summary: Defines a reference to a method that is invoked when a cache entry is about to be removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Information about a cache entry to be removed is contained in a <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments> object. A <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments> object is passed to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateCallback> delegate. The method that implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateCallback> delegate can pass an updated cache entry value back to the cache implementation. The updated cache entry replaces the cache item that is about to be removed.
